title: [Skin Sketch] Dark Cosmic Syndra
body:
https://twitter.com/LittleMissLokii/status/1179605441313042433

Dark Cosmic Syndra I made for Skintober!

Tried to make her a mix of the Dark Cosmic Jhin/Regular Cosmic look with some elements of Dark Star

Also I just really like Syndra {{sticker:sg-syndra}}

replies.body: I dig the vacant expression, as if she's finally achieved her goal of ultimate power but lost herself in the process.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Lutzburg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Zcc7eOG2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-15T23:00:08.202+0000)
>
> I dig the vacant expression, as if she's finally achieved her goal of ultimate power but lost herself in the process.

Exaaaactly

The dark star's power comes with great cost (or something like that in my headcanon haha)

You don't have to be so good at art you're making us look bad >:c

But nah, jokes aside, this is great! Good job!

This is an amazing concept! As a {{champion:134}} main, I absolutely love it. 
{{sticker:sg-lux}} 
For once, it actually screams -S Y N D R A- !!! All of her other skins have been huge disappointments (Legit, all of them.. except Justicar (which came out on her release..). I would envision them to have the essence of Syndra's darkness but.. none of them really displayed her character.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
THIS HOWEVER, is a masterpiece. If this were an actual skin, I would buy it instantly.
Great work friend! You know whats up! 
-
Sigh.. maybe one day Riot will get her right..

> [{quoted}](name=Koreaper,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Zcc7eOG2,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-10-16T07:22:04.052+0000)
>
> This is an amazing concept! As a {{champion:134}} main, I absolutely love it. 
> {{sticker:sg-lux}} 
> For once, it actually screams -S Y N D R A- !!! All of her other skins have been huge disappointments (Legit, all of them.. except Justicar (which came out on her release..). I would envision them to have the essence of Syndra's darkness but.. none of them really displayed her character.
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
> THIS HOWEVER, is a masterpiece. If this were an actual skin, I would buy it instantly.
> Great work friend! You know whats up! 
> -
> Sigh.. maybe one day Riot will get her right..

Aaaa thank you T__T Syndra and Diana will always be two of my favorite champs, so im glad to get this kind of love from a fellow syndra player T OT/

> [{quoted}](name=Rayneomon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Zcc7eOG2,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-16T09:08:05.600+0000)
>
> This skin really suits her. Her cosmic hair is perfect


Thanks a bunch!!! Procreate brushes made for some fun effects!

This skin really suits her. Her cosmic hair is perfect
